message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,450,000. This is a great price considering the value it holds. I'm confident it will be a lucrative investment for you. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet your asking price. I am willing to offer $1,300,000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,300,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,400,000, which is still a great deal for you considering the value of the product. This is my final offer, as I'm confident it will be a profitable purchase for you. Let's make this deal happen.

I understand your position, Alice. While I respect your valuation of the product, I am still constrained by my budget. I am willing to increase my offer to $1,350,000. This is the highest I can go, and I hope we can reach an agreement.
